A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 30+ years of lore and mythos overturned. Shallow character development. Unnecessary power expansion. Edge solely for edge sake. A subplot that makes 0 difference other than making a good 45 min TV special into a 2.5 hour movie. Honestly could have been accomplished in a 22min episode of Rebels. The most disappointing character assassination. Will not watch again. Star Wars ended with Return of the Jedi.
